sys_script_include.description: 获取比赛中参与的球员列表
sys_script_include.name: GetPersonsOfRecord

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_532560_sport.GetPersonsOfRecord</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>获取比赛中参与的球员列表</description><name>GetPersonsOfRecord</name><script><![CDATA[var GetPersons = Class.create();
GetPersons.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor,{
	getPersons: function(){
		var record = new GlideRecord("x_532560_sport_record");
		record.get(this.getParameter('record_id'));
		jslog('xxxxxxx'+ record.game_persons);
		return record.game_persons;
	},
	type: 'GetPersons'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-27 07:25:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>9be36ffc1be31010dca897d7bd4bcbdd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetPersonsOfRecord</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Sport" source="x_532560_sport">c441aa7c1b231010dca897d7bd4bcb8e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Sport">c441aa7c1b231010dca897d7bd4bcb8e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9be36ffc1be31010dca897d7bd4bcbdd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-27 09:07:26</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
